item.title: 2020 IT Conference Summary
item.description: # IT conference to be held in 2020 This is a summary as of January 20. We will update it from time to time. #language ##PyCon JP Python conference Dates: Scheduled for August 28th and 29th Place: Ota-ku Sangyo Plaza PiO Official site ##PHP conference PHP conference Date: October 11 Place: Ota-ku Sangyo Plaza PiO 2019 Official Site 2020 official website ##PHPerKaigi PHP conference Date: February 9th 16:30 ~ February 10, 10:00- February 11th 10:00~ Place: Nerima Ward Residents & Industries Plaza Coconeri Hall 2020 Official Site

item.title: I tried HR Tech to develop an expert search engine by machine learning the in-house meeting information
item.description: ## TL; DR We will create an expert search engine by utilizing the dark data that sleeps inside the company and the data related to meetings. This guy This will help you find the in-house expert and the contact path to that expert. 1. Background. .. .. 1.1 What is work style reform? It is often said that Jitahara has work style reform. Jitahara: Forcing employees to leave the company, such as “Do not work overtime” and “Return on time” without specific measures to reduce overtime hours
